description: Unique identifier for each asset in the fleet management system.
Human-readable identifier for the asset, often including descriptive text.
Name of the organization that owns or operates the asset.
Identifier for financial tracking; confirm with SME.
Current operational status of the asset, indicating if it is active or inactive.
Year of manufacture or acquisition of the asset.
Manufacturer or brand name of the asset.
Specific model designation of the asset as provided by the manufacturer.
Code representing the classification of the asset for categorization purposes.
Registered license plate number of the asset.
State where the asset is registered or primarily operated.
Vehicle Identification Number or serial number for tracking and identification.
Code representing the department responsible for the asset.
Description of the department responsible for managing the asset.
Code identifying the shop or location where the asset is maintained.
Description of the shop or location for asset maintenance.
Indicates the availability schedule of the asset for use.
Color of the asset; confirm with SME.
Total weight of the vehicle when fully loaded; may include 'nan' for unknown.
Code representing the drivetrain configuration; confirm with SME.
Description of the drivetrain configuration; confirm with SME.
Serial number for the body of the asset; confirm with SME.
Serial number for the chassis of the asset; confirm with SME.
Location or site where the asset is primarily used or stored.
Specific location details for the asset; confirm with SME.
Postal code for the asset's registered or operational location.
Additional comments or notes regarding the asset; confirm with SME.
Asset number assigned by the vendor; confirm with SME.
Identifier for the fuel card associated with the asset; confirm with SME.
Priority level assigned to the asset for operational purposes; confirm with SME.
Code for the monitoring group associated with the asset; confirm with SME.
Name of the monitoring group associated with the asset; confirm with SME.
Code indicating the type of usage for the asset; confirm with SME.
Description of the asset's usage type; confirm with SME.
Date when the asset was put into service.
Date when the asset was acquired.
Cost incurred to acquire the asset.
Title of ownership for the asset; confirm with SME.
Type of acquisition for the asset; confirm with SME.
Identifier for any asset that this asset has replaced; confirm with SME.
Estimated useful life of the asset expressed in months.
Description of the primary fuel type used by the asset.
Capacity of the primary fuel tank in specified units.
Unit of measure for the primary fuel capacity.
Description of a secondary fuel type, if applicable; confirm with SME.
Capacity of a secondary fuel tank, if applicable; confirm with SME.
Unit of measure for the secondary fuel capacity; confirm with SME.
Size or specification of the engine used in the asset.
Serial number for the engine; confirm with SME.
Capacity of the oil system in the asset.
Type of measurement for the first meter (e.g., mileage).
Current reading from the first meter; may include 'nan' for unknown.
Expected lifespan of the asset based on the first meter; may include 'nan'.
Reading from the first meter at the time of acquisition; may include 'nan'.
Date of the first meter reading at acquisition.
Lifetime reading from the first meter; may include 'nan'.
Type of measurement for the second meter; confirm with SME.
Current reading from the second meter; confirm with SME.
Expected lifespan based on the second meter; confirm with SME.
Reading from the second meter at acquisition; confirm with SME.
Date of the second meter reading at acquisition; confirm with SME.
Lifetime reading from the second meter; confirm with SME.
Type of measurement for the third meter; confirm with SME.
Current reading from the third meter; confirm with SME.
Expected lifespan based on the third meter; confirm with SME.
Reading from the third meter at acquisition; confirm with SME.
Date of the third meter reading at acquisition; confirm with SME.
Lifetime reading from the third meter; confirm with SME.
Type of transmission used in the asset; confirm with SME.
Capacity for fluids (e.g., transmission fluid); confirm with SME.
Serial number for the transmission; confirm with SME.
First name of the primary contact for the asset; confirm with SME.
Middle initial of the primary contact; confirm with SME.
Last name of the primary contact for the asset; confirm with SME.
Email address of the primary contact; confirm with SME.
Phone number of the primary contact for the asset; confirm with SME.
Indicates if the contact receives email alerts for preventive maintenance; confirm with SME.
Indicates if a 15-point meter is used for tracking; confirm with SME.
Rate of inflation applied for financial calculations; confirm with SME.
Estimated salvage value of the asset at the end of its useful life; confirm with SME.
Indicates if a replacement asset has been collected; confirm with SME.
Subject line for any notes related to the asset; confirm with SME.
Detailed notes regarding the asset; confirm with SME.
